subject: Preakness Stakes
Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Life for the trainer Michael Matz — plane crash survivor, Olympic medalist, divorced father of six — has been full of luck, good and bad. Barbaro's empty stall now reminds him how quickly fortunes can change in racing.
snippet: Life for the trainer Michael Matz — plane crash survivor, Olympic medalist, divorced father of six — has been full of luck, good and bad. Barbaro's empty stall now reminds him how quickly fortunes can change in racing.
